OOC:( OK, this will work)

::DarkMouse::

She was floating around in a space of light and colors. She saw no 
ground below her. She felt peace and calm.  She looked and didn't see 
her body, but felt only her mind.  She saw a great glowing sphere.  
She floated over towards it.  She looked at it. It pulsed with light 
and energy.  "Where am I?" the sphere spoke to her,"You are in the 
great void. I am the Matrix."

She looked at the sphere, "I"m dead?"

The sphere spoke, "Yes, but I am returning you back to the land of 
the living."

"WHy must I go back?"

"You must go back and keep the balance of good and evil."

She felt herself being pushed back. She blacked out.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Black Aracnia looked at the body of Darkmouse. It had been dead 
for 
> several hours. Aracnia was mournful because Darkmouse was a great 
soldier, if 
> not, in some strange and morbid way, her only friend left after the 
departure 
> of Hell Beast and her old crew.
>     In the lab, Hell Beasts old lab, Aracnia hoped to bring 
Darkmouse back to 
> life. He left a large amount of Liquid Energon behinde and Aracnia 
tended to 
> drain her mech and replace it with the powerful fluid. If it 
worked, 
> Darkmouse would be very energenic. She would most likely have a 
boost in 
> strength, size, and intelligence. It was risky, but she needed 
Darkmouse.
>     Alone, with the body, Aracnia inserted one tube into her left 
arm that 
> would pump out the Mech, and placed a tube in her right arm that 
would pump 
> in the Liquid Energon. In any even, they would know if she would 
rise agian 
> in an hour or so.
